channel.title: Tau cannon not spinning
channel.description: It was spinning before but now it doesn't. When charging the gauss gun, it just glows but it doesn't spin. Also, the charging sound gets cut-off then the overcharged sound plays. Any ideas how to fix it?

item.title: Tau cannon not spinning
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Rebooting and Reinstalling shit should never be your first choice of action. My bet was that maybe you had a mod that messed with the tau cannon’s script

Read full topic

item.title: Tau cannon not spinning
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
Yeah reinstall worked but I have to download again all the mods -.-
